page.title: 14Clubs or Social Groups
page.content: The oldest club is the Ancient Order of Foresters. It was set up in 1880. They meet once a month. The Conservation group have been going for the shortest time. We were able to find the most information on the Tisbury Wives Club. This was founded in 1963 by a Mrs Phillips. There are around thirty members and they meet once a month. In 1957 the Flower Group was founded again it has about thirty members whose ages range from 20 to 70 years. Tisbury Arts Group was set up in 1974, there are around 100 members who usually meet monthly but more often if a performance is due. The number of clubs and social groups in Tisbury is numberous and being a rural community this is what you would expect.
